item.title: Why Was My Paper Rejected without Review?
item.description: A guidance highlighting why your paper was rejected by Environmental Science & Technology and what basic characteristics your paper should possess so it can move forward. (For the original: https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/acs.est.0c05784) Highlights:

item.title: How to edit/modify/customise Endnote references styles?
item.description: You will only be able to edit the style if the style is saved to your computer. Go to Tools - Output styles - select the style to edit. Select Citations to view how the intext citation displays and make any changes. Select Bibliography - Templates to view the templates for the different reference types and make changes. Most of changes would be made in these places. When you close the style window, you will be prompted to save changes you have made.
